Gloria is 23 years old. She is married, and she and her husband and their two children live in their own little home that they've had for a few years.

She's very satisfied to be helping her husband with the household expenses and to be able to support the home activities with her business. She learned her work very young, and since then she has been in the business of producing milk and raising animals. In spite of all their needs, she has gotten ahead and now she wants to have her own cattle. Through the efforts of her parents, she was able to complete primary and secondary school, but due to her family's difficult economic situation, she had to begin working very young and become a supporter of herself and her family.

The work she learned is very common in this area, as it's a rural area. She works 6-8 hours every day caring for the animals. It's a little bit hard for her to take care of her chickens since she doesn't have a very big space to keep them, but other than that she doesn't have any major issues. on the contrary, it has motivated her to get ahead for her own good and that of her family. At the moment she is requesting a loan so that she can complete the process of getting her papers on some land she bought and also buy a milk cow, which will help her become more profitable by selling the milk.  

Gloria and her husband wish to extend their sincerest thanks to the Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making possible the growth of their personal and professional lives.

loans.use: buy a milk cow and pay the deed on her land

loans.name: Idalia Sarai

texts.es:
Idalia tiene 26 años de edad, vive en un cantón con su mamá y su hermano, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos y uno de ellos estudia en la escuela. Su madre cuida a los niños mientras ella trabaja.

Actualmente tiene un negocio de venta de desayunos en el centro de la ciudad, tiene 3 años de dedicarse a este negocio, ella trabajó durante mucho tiempo como empleada en un comedor, y fue de esa forma como aprendió este trabajo, gracias a ello tomó la iniciativa de emprender su propio negocio. Sus principales clientes son los trabajadores de la zona así como estudiantes de la institución que está ubicada cerca de su trabajo.

Ella atiende su negocio de desayunos de 6:00 AM a 10:00 AM, seguidamente, continúa trabajando en una venta de helados que está cerca de su negocio, en el cual labora de 11: AM a 4.30 PM. Para dirigirse a sus labores diarias, debe hacer uso del transporte público la cual hace un recorrido de aproximadamente 30 minutos.


EL crédito será invertido en la compra de sillas y mesas, pues las que tiene no le dan abasto para atender toda la demanda de clientes que le visitan. Esto le permitirá brindar un mejor servicio, y por ende mejorar los ingresos de su negocio e ir creciendo en el mercado.

Su sueño es ampliar su negocio, vendiendo almuerzos y contratar a otra persona que le ayude en este trabajo, y así también alcanzar una estabilidad económica que le permita  brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos ya que es madre soltera.
texts.en:
Idalia is 26 years old and lives with her mother and brother. She is a single mother, with two children, one of whom is attending school. Idalia's mother looks after the children when she is working.

Idalia currently has a business selling breakfasts in the centre of the city. She has been doing this work for three years. For a long time Idalia worked in a restaurant and it was there that she learned this trade. Thanks to the restaurant job, she was able to take the initiative and start her own business. Her amin customers are the local workers, as well as students at the nearby institute.

Idalia offers breakfasts from 6am until 10am. Afterwards she sells ice cream nearby, from 11am until 4.30pm. In order to get to work Idalia must spend 30 minutes travelling on public transport.

This loan will be used to buy chairs and tables as she does not currently have enough to provide for all the customers who come to her. This loan will allow Idalia to offer better service and, thus, earn a higher income from her business and have a growing spot on the local market.

Idalia's dream is to expand her business, selling lunches and taking on an employee to help with the work. She has can then also have financial stability to give her children - to whom she is a single mother - a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chairs and tables.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a Ghanaian married woman, aged 49 years, living in Accra, Ghana. She has been selling maize for six years now. This work has improved tremendously since she started taking this loan. She buys the maize and supplies to customers.

She describes herself as a hardworking woman though she faces challenges of competition from similar businesses. Her dream of building a permanent home in the future is almost achieved as she started building. Victoria intends to use the loan to buy two big bags of maize and supply.

loans.use: To buy maize and supply to customers.

loans.name: Askar

texts.ru: Этот мужчина Аскар. Аскар живет с родными в городке Турсунзаде. Он работает там же. Аскар занимается животноводством. У него есть большой опыт работы в сфере животноводства, но начал деятельность в этом направлении 6 лет назад. Он считает, что набрался большого опыта работы и настало время расширять бизнес. Он планирует купить по больше мелко рогатых скотин и разводить их. Но для этого ему не обходимы средства. По этой причине он просит ему помочь. Когда он получит кредит, у него будет много скотов и соответственно дохода. Помогите ему.
texts.en: This is Askar, who lives with relatives in the small town of Tursun-zoda, where he also works. Askar raises animals for a living. He has a great deal of experience in this field, though he only began working in it six years ago, and he thinks that now that he has built up experience, it is a good time to expand his business. He plans to buy more small livestock and to raise them. But he doesn't have enough capital to do this, which is why he is asking for help. When he receives a loan, he will have more livestock and, accordingly, more income. Please help him.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to increase head count

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам сын, муж и отец трехлетнего ребенка. Рустам живет с родными в городке Исфара. Он женат. Рустам вместе с женой и ребенком живут в родительском доме. Чтобы обеспечить родных, Рустам 6 месяцев работает таксистом, подвозить жителей Исфары из одной точки назначения до другой. Ему хватает на обеспечение ребенка, но сейчас его машина сломалась. И работа Рустама остановилась. У него не хватает денег, чтобы отремонтировать машину, потому, что запчасти стоят дорого. Поэтому он просит кредит для ремонта машины. Помогите ему.
texts.en: Rustam is a beloved son, husband and father of a three-year-old child.  He and his relatives live in the city of Isfara.  Rustam lives with his wife and child at his parents' house.  In order to provide for his family, he has been working as a taxi driver for the past six months, taking Isfara residents from one area of the city to another.  He makes enough money to support his child, but his car recently broke down, and he had to stop working.  Since spare parts are quite expensive, he doesn't have enough money to repair his car and he is therefore taking a loan.  Thank you for your help.

loans.use: to repair his taxi, in order to be able to continue his activity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more rice, red oil, and sugar to sell

loans.name: Straton

texts.en: Straton is 66 years old. He is a father of four and has been in the fabric business for the past ten years. He sells fabrics and has requested the loan to buy more types of fabrics for sale. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family.

loans.use: To buy more fabrics for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish to expand her business.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Esta es la historia de Roxana, ella es una persona responsable, respetuosa, amable,  cordial, trabajadora y estudiosa, vive con la mama, ella ha luchado por los estudios y por la carrera, se destaca por ser una persona humilde y de buenos principios.

Las metas son terminar los estudios de auxiliar judicial, entrar a la policía y ser profesional, los proyectos que ella tiene es tener la casa propia y ser toda una profesional en la policía, estudia en campo alto gracias a la oportunidad de financiar la carrera con el subsidio de kiva, ya que los gastos el año pasado eran un poco más económicos y este año incremento el valor de la mensualidad,  sabe que con la ayuda de los profesores será la mejor en la carrera y servir al país con fe y patria.
texts.en:
This is Roxana: responsible, respectful and friendly. She is kind, hard-working, and studious. She lives with her mother, and she has fought hard for her schooling and her career path. Her humility and her moral character set her apart.

Her goals are to finish her studies as a legal aid and enter the police force as a working professional. She hopes to have her own home and be a professional in the police force. She attends CampoAlto thanks to the opportunity to finance her studies through Kiva. Last year's costs were a little lower, but this year, tuition went up. She knows that with the help of her professors, she will be the best in her field and she will serve her country with faith and pride.

loans.use: pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Gulchehrakhon

texts.en: Gulchehrakhon is a young and industrious woman; she is a kind woman. Gulchehrekhon is married with no children. Her husband is a builder. His income is not enough for improving living conditions. She wants to organize her own business and in this way earn her living. She took part in a course ‘To Get Ahead’ of women organization and got enough skills about business from this course. She is going to run a business through animal sales. She is asking for a loan of 5000 Somoni to buy cattle for organizing her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle for her new animal sales business

loans.name: Raja

texts.en:
Raja is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo. 
Raja is an 18-year-old married woman from a small village near Nablus city. Her husband has an electrical machines repair store. it is a good business and the only one in his village. Raja and her husband would like to improve the store and buy all the needed products. 
Raja took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her husband to buy more repair parts for the electrical repair store. By taking this loan, the sales will be increased and also the family income.

loans.use: to buy more repair parts for the electrical repair store

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen lives in Sisian town. He lives there with his wife and three little children. He has been involved in delivery service. Using his mini truck, Karen provides different delivery services to locals in Sisian town. Among locals there are not many car owners, so the service that Karen provides is highly demanded among people. He is now asking this loan to be able to purchase new tires and renovate the vehicle. The loan is very important for him as the car is currently in poor working condition and Karen isn't able to complete his orders.

He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is important for this hard working young businessman and he hopes for your goodwill.

loans.use: to pay for new tires and renovation of the vehicle

loans.name: Pedro Vicente

texts.es: Esta es la historia de pedro, el es un muchacho humilde y responsable, trabajador, sencillo y honesto, vive con los papas y hermanos, se destaca por ser una persona de buenos sentimientos, las metas son estudiar auxiliar judicial, graduarse y entrar a la policía, lo proyectos son ser profesional y entrar a la policía, tener la casa propia, el decidió entrar acampo alto, porque se dio cuenta que con la ayuda de fácil financiación y planes de pago que le pueden ofrecer con kiva que es mas cómoda de pagar, ya que hasta ahora entra a primer semestre y los gastos son un poco más caros y el solo los paga, sabe que con la ayuda de los profesores será uno de los mejores, porque le dan oportunidad de pagar la carrera y a si graduarse y ser profesional para servirle a la patria con orgullo y corazón
texts.en:
This is Pedro's story:

Pedro is a humble, responsible, hard-working, simple and honest young man. He lives with his parents and siblings, and is a man of good feelings. Pedro's goals are to study to be a legal assistant, to graduate and to enter the police force. He plans to become a professional and own his own house. Pedro decided to study at Campo Alto as he realised that, with easy financial support and payment plans offered by Kiva, it will be much easier to pay for his studies. Pedro is in first semester and the costs are high, and he is paying them all himself. Pedro knows that with the teachers' help, he can be one of the best students because he is being given the opportunity to pay for his studies. When he graduates Pedro can become a great professional and serve his country with pride and with all his heart.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for one semester.

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод живет на районе Шахритус. Шахритус то место где чистый воздух, не испорченная природа и где гостеприимный и дружелюбный народ. Дилшод в Шахритусе живет и работает. Он занимается ремонтом компьютеров. Дилшод хочет параллельно начать новый бизнес животноводства. Пользуясь прекрасным климатом района он хочет начать и в течение нескольких лет продвигать данный бизнес. Но ему нужны средства. Он просит кредит, чтобы купить телят и начать бизнес. Помогите ему начать бизнес.
texts.en: Dilshod lives and works in the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan.  Shahrituz is famous for its clean air, unspoiled nature and for the hospitable and friendly nature of its people.  Dilshod makes a living repairing computers.  In addition to his job, he would like to start a new business raising cattle.  Taking advantage of the wonderful climate of his region, he wants to start a business in animal husbandry and spend a few years developing it.  But he doesn't have enough money to start his business, so he is taking a loan to buy some calves.  Please help him to start his new business.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Kifah

texts.en:
Kifah is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son appears in the photo. 

Kifah is a 43-year-old married woman from Jabalia city. She is a mother with one son and two daughters. Her son has a barber shop. It is a good business and is the only barber shop in his village. Kifah's son would like to improve his barber shop and buy all of the products he needs.

Kifah took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her son to buy more products he uses in his barber shop. By taking this loan, the family income will be increased.

loans.use: to help her son to buy more products he uses in his barber shop.

loans.name: Geraldine Alexandra

texts.es:
Ella es Geraldine y por medio de esta historia se dispone a expresar las metas y prioridades, una de ellas es terminar este técnico de auxiliar de enfermería ya que es importante para ella poder brindar un buen servicio al paciente, otra meta importante en la vida es poder llegar a realizar la carrera profesional de enfermera, y  si sacar adelante a la pequeña hija de un año y medio y llegar a darle el mejor ejemplo como persona y madre, a largo plazo aspira poder brindarle lo mejor a la familia la cual la ha apoyado siempre, para ella es muy importante aprovechar al máximo esta oportunidad de realizar este técnico ya que no solamente piensa en el futuro de ella, sino además en el futuro de la familia.
Eligio esta institución que es reconocida porque tiene buenas referencias en cuanto al técnico que está estudiando, a demás le brinda varias facilidades de pago y entre ella esta kiva, que le brinda un subsidio para que el pago de las cuotas sea más económico, este subsidio le sería muy bueno ya que tiene a la hija pequeña y la persona que responde por ellas es la mama, así que sería una ayuda económica grande para la mama, hasta el momento se siente satisfecha con el manejo de la enseñanza y las metodologías.
texts.en:
This is Geraldine and this story tells her goals and priorities.

One of them is to finish her nursing assistant program because it's important for her to be able to provide the patient with good service.  Another important goal in life is to be able to become a professional nurse so she can get her year-and-a-half-old daughter ahead and be an exemplary person and mother to her.  Over the long term she hopes to give the best to the family that has always supported her.

It's very important to Geraldine to make the most of this opportunity to learn this skill, because she's thinking about not only her own future but also that of her family.

Geraldine chose this well-known institution because it's highly recommended for the field she's studying.  It also offers a variety of payment options, among which is the Kiva subsidy that makes the payments more economical.  This subsidy would be very good because she has a young daughter, and the person who's responsible for them is her mother.  So it would be a big financial help for her mother.

Geraldine has been satisfied with the teaching and the methodologies.

loans.use: to pay her tuition for the semester

loans.name: Sara Guadalupe

texts.es:
Sara, es madre soltera de dos hijos, los cuales están estudiando, ella tiene 42 años de edad, para poder tener los recursos económicos con los cuales cubre los gastos familiares se dedica desde hace tres años a atender un chalet de lunes a viernes, en el cual ofrece comida, bebidas, golosinas, etc., hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema en administrar su negocio.
El capital lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, carnes, verduras, golosinas, bebidas, etc., para tener su inventario debidamente surtido para mejorar la atención a sus clientes, espera mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus ganancias y atraer nuevos clientes.
Sueña con aumentar la rentabilidad de su negocio y ofrecer a sus hijos una mejora alimentación, vestuario, alimentación y una educación superior.
texts.en:
Sara, a single mother of two children in school, is 42 years old. Three years ago, in order to meet her family's economic needs, she decided to open a cafe from Monday to Friday. She sells food, drinks, sweets and more. So far, she hasn't had any trouble running her business.

She will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of rice, meet, vegetables, candies, soft drinks and more to appropriately stock her inventory. That way, she can pay more attention to her customers' needs. She expects to improve her sales, increase her earnings, and attract new customers.

She hopes to improve the profitability of her business and provide her children with better nutrition, clothing, and higher education.

loans.use: stock her cafe

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is a married woman. She has 6 children. She operates a retail business where she owns rental houses that she rents to customers. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be high prices of building materials. She will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy paint, cement, sand and other materials to build more rental houses. Her business goal is to own 10 more houses for her rental business within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will be financially stable. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: buy paint, cement, sand and other materials to build more rental houses

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo. 
Samar is a 29-year-old married woman from Nablus city. She is a mother with three sons. Her husband has a barber shop, which he has operated for three years. Samar's husband would like to improve the barber shop and buy all the products he needs.
Samar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her husband to buy more products he needs for his barber shop. By taking this loan, the family income will be increased.

loans.use: to help her husband to buy more products to use in his barber shop

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio, se ha presentado la necesidad de invertir nuevamente en su negocio de cultivo de maíz, comprara semilla, abono, fertilizantes y plaguicidas, para su próxima siembra.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a tener a su disposición los recursos económicos con los cuales pudo comprar los insumos agrícolas que le dieron como resultado una cosecha abundante, granos de calidad  y mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Julio has returned again because of the need to invest in his business of growing corn, by buying seed, manure, fertilizers and pesticides, for the next planting.

The previous loan helped him to have the financial resources available with which he could buy agricultural supplies giving him as a result an abundant harvest, quality grain, and higher income.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and pesticides

loans.name: Henri Esmit

texts.es:
Henri, es un señor de 33 años, es casado, su esposa tiene 30 años y poseen tres hijos los cuales se mantienen estudiado, se dedica a cultivar granos básicos, es una actividad que realiza desde su niñez y lo aprendió dentro de su familia, por el momento no le representa ningún problema realizarla.
Invertirá en la compra de insecticidas, herbicidas, plaguicidas, abono y semilla, teniendo estos insumos podrá preparar la tierra y cultivar sin alguna dificultad, espera tener una cosecha abundante, libre de plagas y mejores ingresos.
Su sueño es tener una amplia área de cultivo para aumentar su rentabilidad y tener los recursos económicos con los cuales cancelara sus deudas y mejorara el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Henri (age 33) and his wife (age 30) have three children, all of whom they are able to keep in school.  Henri's work is growing staple crops, a job he's done since he was a boy and learned it from his family. He is currently not having any trouble doing the work.

He will invest in the purchase of insecticides, herbicides, pest controls, manure and seeds. He will use these supplies to prepare the land and plant his crops easily. He hopes to have an abundant crop, free of pests, and substantial income.

He dreams of having a large plot to farm to increase his profitability and of having the economic resources to cancel his debts and improve his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: buy insecticide, herbicide, manure and seed.

loans.name: Sidonah

texts.en: Sidonah is a single, 30-year-old business woman who sells cosmetics in Ishaka town. She has a shop for cosmetics and jewelry, which is her major source of income. In addition to the income from the shop, she also has rentals which fetch some money in a given period. She works six days per week and works an average of nine hours per day, which gives her enough time for her customers. She started the business in 2008 with high hopes that the profits from the business would sustain her and her family members, but the stiff competition in her area of operation has hindered this. However, she has applied for a loan of three million shillings so that she can buy more stock items. This will help her to beat her competitors since she will have a variety of items that will attract more customers to her. Her clients are mainly students of Kampala International University and other middle-aged people in Ishaka town. She hopes to retain her clientele if the loan is given since she will restock the shop and meet her clients' needs. Sidonah is hopeful that if she restocks the shop and keeps being the hardworking person she has always been, she will expand her business, which has always been her dream in life.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics

loans.name: Abduhamid

texts.en: Abduhamid was born in the year 1992. He lives with his parents and brother in a big house which was build with dedication from his father. He was one of the best pupils in school. Abduhamid has a higher degree. He worked as a rent worker after classes.  Now, he is going to organize his own business. He wants to organize a business producing candies. He built a workshop in his house. Now, he must to buy cauldrons for cooking candies. His brother will help him to manage the business. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 Somoni to buy cauldrons for starting his new business. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cauldrons for cooking candies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more cassava for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice and cooking seasoning for resale.

loans.name: Asaad

texts.en:
Asaad is a 35-year-old married father of two children. He is a Palestinian refugee, who has been working in the scrap trade business since 2010. His business is doing just fine, but needs an additional external support to develop it and increase his business capital.

Asaad also works in renting motorcycles, which is a requested service in his region. He used to work in renting and making necessary maintenance to bicycles, but he is working on developing another business sector to respond better to his family's needs.

Asaad is acquiring his seventh loan cycle from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, which he describes as his lifetime companion, to increase his hardware capital through buying more scrap and registering his truck to keep it legally working in the Lebanese territories.

Through his previously acquired loans Asaad declares he was capable of developing both businesses easily and this was reflected positively on his family's socioeconomic situation.

loans.use: To increase his hardware capital through buying more scrap and registering his truck to keep it legally working in the Lebanese territories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products  he uses in his barber shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for resale.

loans.name: Marie Chantal

texts.en: Marie Chantal is 33 years old. She is married and has two children, aged between two and five years of age. She sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, beans and cooking oil for resale. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family and to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice, beans and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is a 31 year old married woman. She has 2 children. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals, sugar,cooking oil, flour and other items. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are of all types. 

Martha describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough funds. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals, sugar, bread, flour and other items. She hopes that in the future, she will improve her standard of living and also be able to sell by wholesale. This is her sixth loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of KES 50,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals, sugar, bread, flour and other items.

loans.name: Isabel Del Rocio

texts.es:
Isabel nació en la ciudad de Latacunga en la parroquia Ignacio Flores de la provincia de Cotopaxi perteneciente a la República del Ecuador, esta zona es urbana de la ciudad se caracteriza por sus habitantes que se dedican a la crianza y venta de animales menores. Isabel tiene 39 años de edad, actualmente se encuentra casada, vive solo con su esposo y uno de sus hijos en su casita propia desde hace ya algunos años.
Ha sido para ella muy satisfactorio para el poder ayudar a su esposo en todos los gastos de la casa y ser un gran apoyo en las actividades del hogar como en el negocio, actualmente tienen un pequeño restaurante donde atiende junto a su esposo y una de sus hijas mayores de edad.
Con el esfuerzo de sus padres pudo terminar la primaria, y por la difícil situación económica de su familia tuvo que trabajar desde muy pequeña  demostrando hasta ahora ser una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora.
Por el momento están solicitando  un crédito  para poder  renovar  sus mesas y sillas ya que las que actualmente tiene son prestadas por una vecina, en vista de que su negocio ha crecido necesita realizar esta inversión, esto ayudará a dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y mejorarán sus ventas lo cual servirá para obtener mas rentabilidad en su negocio.
Isabel y su esposo quieren extender un sincero agradecimiento y felicitación a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Isabel was born in the city of Latacunga, in the parish of Ignacio Flores, in the province of Cotopaxi of the Republic of Ecuador. This urban area is characterized by its inhabitants that make a living raising and selling small animals. Isabel is 39 years old. Currently, she is married and lives just with her husband and one of their children in a house they have owned for a few years. For Isabel it has been very satisfying to be able to help her husband with their household expenses. She has been a great help as much in the house as in their business. Currently, they have a small restaurant where Isabel, her husband, and one of her adult daughters work. 

With great sacrifice from her parents, Isabel was able to finish elementary school. However, because of her family's difficult financial situation, she had to begin working at a very young age. She has shown herself to be, even today, a very hardworking and enterprising woman. 

At this time, Isabel is requesting a loan in order to be able to improve the tables and chairs since she currently uses borrowed ones from her neighbor. Seeing as how her business has grown, she will need to make this investment that will help her provider her customers with better service. In this way, she will improve her sales, which will make her business more profitable. 

Isabel and her husband want to extend a sincere "thank you" and greetings to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva for having made possible this growth in their personal and professional life.

loans.use: for the purchase and renovation of tables and chairs for her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more ice and alcoholic drinks for her business.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 43-year-old single man and has no children. He describes himself as an honest person. He has operated a spare parts shop at the roadside near his house for six years. His business is strategically located to attract more customers from every part of life. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high price of spare parts. He will use the GHS 1500 loan to add to his stock of spare parts. His business goal is to excel within another six years from now.

He hopes that he will have a bright future. This is his fifth loan with ID-Ghana. His previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to improve his life status.

loans.use: to add stock of spare part to his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more cooking oil, flour and rice to expand her business.

loans.name: Fortunee

texts.en:
Fortunee is 43 years old. She is married with four children. They all go to school. 

She owns a retail business and has been in the business for the past three years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, maize flour, and soap for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, maize flour, and soap for sale.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
Elías, se ha decidido por otro crédito para invertirlo en el cultivo de época de riego necesita comprar abono, fertilizantes, plaguicidas e insecticidas, para preparar la tierra y tener una buena cosecha.
El préstamo anterior le sirvió para tener los recursos económicos con los cuales compro los insumos necesarios para la cosecha, le ayudo a aumentar su producción tener mejores ganancias y a dar un estilo de vida a su familia mucho mejor.
texts.en: Elias, has decided on another loan to invest in planting during the irrigation season. He needs to buy compost, fertilizers, pesticides and insecticides in order to prepare the soil and have a good harvest. The previous loan was useful to get the financial resources, with which he bought the necessary supplies for the harvest. It helped him to increase his production, earn more and give his family a much better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, pesticides and insecticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more drinks, pure water, and cigarettes to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes such as tubs, plates, cups, bowls, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more frozen fish for her business.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 30-year-old married woman. She has two children, aged 1 year and 8 years. She describes herself to be humble. 

She operates a retail store where she sells clothes and beauty products. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes and beauty products. Her business goal is to have more shops within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will buy a house. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to cater to family needs.

loans.use: buy more stock of clothes and beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried peppers and beans for her business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 37 years old. He lives with his wife and one year old son in a town called Kitwe, located in the Copperbelt province of Zambia. He provides financial services to people in his community through mobile money transfers. He had a full-time job but began his mobile money transfer business because his salary was not high enough to support his family's needs. He currently employs one person. Joseph describes himself as hardworking and friendly. He enjoys running his business because it is easy to operate and a reliable way for him to provide for his family. 

This is the first time Joseph is taking out a loan. He has requested a Kiva loan to boost his working capital. This will help him to serve more customers by providing a safe way to send, receive, and pay bills through his shop; it will also help him earn more profits. Joseph plans to expand his business by opening additional outlets in the future. He sees the opportunity this loan through Kiva will provide him in accomplishing this goal. He would like to thank all the Kiva lenders for their support of entrepreneurs who, like himself, need financing.

loans.use: to have cash on hand to process mobile money transfers

loans.name: Danna Gisseth

texts.es:
Ella se llama Danna Gisseth, tiene 19 años de edad, ella quiere graduarse de la Institución de educación superior  las mercedes y necesita el convenio ya que la hermana  está en las mismas condiciones y los gastos de educación para las dos serian un poco altos. 
Como proyecto a corto plazo ella quiere continuar con los estudios para poder tener un trabajo estable para poder crecer a nivel académico y persona. 

Como proyecto a mediano plazo ella quiere graduarse con honores de la carrera que está estudiando, continuar y poder hacer una especialización en lo que a ella más le gusta, crecer más a nivel académico y persona y a si lograr conseguir un trabajo estable y poder ayudase a ella misma y a la familia.  

Como proyecto a largo plazo ella sueña y quiere ser independiente, tener la propia empresa y poder tener subsidiar empleo a mucha gente, lograr tener mas estudios ascender económica y académicamente, para poder tener una estabilidad económica mejor y con mayor prioridades.
texts.en:
This young woman is Danna Gisseth. She is 19 years old. She wants to graduate from the Las Mercedes institute of higher education, and she needs the [loan] agreement since her sister is in the same situation, and the cost of education for both would be a little high.

As a short-term project, she wants to continue with her studies so that she can have a stable job to be able to grow both in her academic level and as a person.

As a medium-term project, she wants to graduate with honors from the program in which she is studying, continue and be able to have a specialization in what she likes best, grow more at academic and personal levels, and thus manage to find a stable job and be able to help herself and her family.

In the long term, she dreams and wants to be independent, to have her own business and be able to provide employment to many people. to be able to study more, to rise economically and academically, and to be able to have better economic stability with greater priorities.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school fees.

loans.name: Immaculee

texts.en: Immaculee is 46 years old. She owns a shop selling foodstuffs. She has requested the loan to buy more mineral water, bread, and andazi (pastries) for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: to buy more water, bread, and andazi to sell

loans.name: Maritza Karina

texts.es:
Maritza es una mujer ecuatoriana de 24 años de edad nació en la ciudad de Latacunga, en la parroquia Tanicuchí pertenceneciente a la república del Ecuador, está actualmente casada tiene dos hijos pequeños, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logró terminar la escuela primaria y luego la falta de recursos económicos la a llevó a trabajar desde muy chica para poder sustentar sus necesidades. A pesar de tener un trabajo que le demanda mucho tiempo y esfuerzo, ella no se negó a educar y mantener a sus hijos. Ahora Maritza vive con su esposo y sus pequeños hijos en Pastocalle ubicado en la Provincia de Cotopaxi en la República del Ecuador es una zona rural donde su gente se dedica a la elaboración de escobas, la casa donde viven es propia y viven ahi ya muchos años. 
Maritza en vista de la falta de recursos económicos en su hogar decidió dedicarse a la crianza y venta de cerdos, es muy trabajadora y emprendedora pero sobre todo es muy dedicada a su trabajo en el campo, esto ha servido para ayudar en su hogar, hoy está solicitando un crédito para invertir en la construcción de una chanchera.
Martitza y su esposo agradecen a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Maritza is a 24 year-old Ecuadorian woman who was born in the city of Latacunga in Tanicuchi parish in the Republic of Ecuador.  She is now married and has 2 small children.  Thanks to the efforts of her parents, she was able to finish elementary school.  Later, a lack of funds led her to work from an early age to help support the family.  In spite of having a job that demands a lot of her time and efforts, she has not neglected to educate and support her children.  Now Maritza is living with her husband and their small children in Pastocalle, located in Cotopaxi province in the Republic of Ecuador.  This is a rural area where many people work making brooms.  Maritza lives in her own house, a place she's lived for many years.

Maritza, seeing the lack of financial resources in her household, decided to start raising and selling animals.  She is very hardworking and enterprising, but most of all she is very devoted to her work in the fields, as this has helped the household.  Today she is requesting a loan to invest in the construction of a pigpen.  

Maritza and her husband thank Fundacion Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva for making it possible for them to grow in their work and personal lives.

loans.use: to build a pigpen

loans.name: Speciose

texts.en: Speciose is 62 years old. She sells cattle and has been in the business for the past 19 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more cows and goats to sell. The profits from the business will be used to provide for the family.

loans.use: to buy more animals to sell such as cows and goats

loans.name: Amalya

texts.en:
Amalya lives in Yerevan. She is a nurse working at a local clinic for many years. She also provides different medical consultations to local people in her town. She is a kind and responsible person who takes care of her clients and assists them with their medical problems. 

Amalya applied for this loan to be able to purchase new equipment needed for her work. She also plans to renovate her workplace and provide people better conditions in her clinic. 

Amalya has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan will greatly assist Amalya to continue her work as a nurse, and she hopes for lenders' goodwill and support.

loans.use: to pay for new equipment and to renovate her  workplace

loans.name: Thy Will Be Group

texts.en:
These members are part of the group call 'Thy Will Be' which has a membership of five. They live in the Dansoman area which is a suburb of the capital of Ghana. All of the members of this group are working to help improve their community.

Grace is a member and the representative of this group. She sells soya beans, cooking oil, meat, and onions to many customers. She provides good services, and she stands out for the effort and sacrifice she makes. She is requesting this loan to buy more soya beans, cooking oil, meat, and onions so that she can continue with her business.

All the members are grateful for the opportunity they are being given to grow.

loans.use: to buy more soya beans, cooking oil, meat, and onions so that she can continue with her business.

loans.name: Josiane

texts.en: Josiane is 28 years old. She runs a sewing business. She sews clothes and has spent five years in the business. With the loan, she would like to buy more thread and fabrics to make clothes for sale. The profits from the business will be saved for a better future.

loans.use: To buy more thread and fabric

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon is a 29-year-old married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be determined. He operates a retail business where he sells bicycle spare parts and repairs bicycles. He has been involved in this business for four years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are bicycle owners. He describes his biggest business challenge to be theft. He will use the Kes 70,000 loan to buy more stock of bicycle spare parts. His business goal is to economically sustain his business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will economically and socially sustain himself. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business and pay the loan.

loans.use: buy more bicycle spare parts

loans.name: Beatha

texts.en: Beatha is age 41. She is married with four children. Her husband sells animals. With the loan, she would like to buy more bananas, sweet potatoes and potatoes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family.

loans.use: To buy more potatoes, bananas and sweet potatoes to sell

loans.name: Sabali Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    SABALI est constitué de  4 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 47 ans et 6 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  MASSABLACOURA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 6ème prêt. Les 5 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  céréales à l’image de SARAN qui est la 1ère femme debout  dans la photo de la droite vers la gauche. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 1100 kg de maïs avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 45.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Sabali group is comprised of four married women. On average, they are 47 years old, have six children, and live in extended traditional families in the neighborhood of Massablacoura in the city of Bougouni. 

They know one another through neighbors, friendship, and business. In order to reinforce their financial capacity and better run their business, they joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. They are now on their sixth loan, and have properly repaid their five previous loans.

This group of women sells cereals. Saran is the woman standing at right in the photo. With her loan, she plans on buying 1,100 kg of corn from wholesalers in Bougouni. She sells at the market and out of her home, for retail and for credit, and to a mixed clientele. 

She would like to earn an average monthly profit of 45,000 FCFA that she will use to invest in the business and reimburse the loan.

loans.use: buy cereals.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.en:
Rafael lives in Nor Kharberd village in the Ararat region with his wife and 7-year-old son. Rafael has been driving a taxi service for five years already. He uses his own car, which is currently damaged and needs to be renovated. That's the reason Rafael has applied for this loan. He will be able to renovate his car and continue providing his taxi service

He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan will greatly assist Rafael and he hopes for lenders' support of his business.

loans.use: to pay for repairing his car

loans.name: Jean De Dieu

texts.en: Jean De Dieu is 32 years old. He is married with three children. He sells spare parts for bicycles. He would like to buy more spare parts to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more bicycle spare parts

loans.name: Adele

texts.en: Adele is a mother of two children. She sells charcoal and has been in the business for five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more charcoal for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more charcoal to sell

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en: Chantal is 25 years old. She is single and dedicated to running a retail business as her future. She hopes to rely on the business she does. She has requested a loan to buy more rice, sugar, beans and soaps to sell. The profits from the business will be saved.

loans.use: To buy more rice, sugar, beans and soap to sell

loans.name: Soutoura Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    SOUTOURA est constitué de  8 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 30 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  MASSABLACOURA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 1er prêt. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de   condiments à l’image de AMI qui est la 2ème femme debout  dans la photo de la droite vers la gauche. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, diverses qualités de condiments  avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Soutoura group is comprised of eight married women. On average, they are 30 years old and have five children. 

They live in extended traditional families in the Massablacoura neighborhood in the city of Bougouni. 

They know one another through neighbors, friendship, and business. In order to reinforce their finances and better run their business, they joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. This is their first loan. 

This group of women sells condiments through Ami who is standing second from the right in the photo. With her loan, she would like to buy different types of condiments from the wholesalers in Bougouni. She makes her sales in the market and out of her home, for retail and for credit, and to a mixed clientele. 

She would like to earn an average monthly profit of 15,000 FCFA that will be used to invest in the business and repay the loan.

loans.use: buy condiments.

loans.name: Santiago Roberto

texts.es:
El se llama Santiago, tiene 25 años; uno de los sueños es poder tener la oportunidad de estudiar una de las carreras en la fundación las mercedes, ya que primero que todo quiere darle un mejor futuro a la familia dejando de lado el trabajo que ejerce de mensajero motorizado; segundo es una persona con alta convicción y que aun quiere verdaderamente crecer como persona en todo aspecto, tercero y ultimo que quiere aprovechar la oportunidad y facilidad que le brinda la fundación las mercedes y en convenio con kiva, para capacitarse y tener un mejor mañana, ya que cuentan con las facilidades de financiación y precios asequibles, ya que para el es un poco económico pagar las mensualidades al valor kiva y no con el valor que las mercedes le están ofreciendo, ademas que brindan un gran numero de programas técnicos y son reconocidos a nivel nacional.

Espera que como el pueda seguir contando con ustedes para seguir haciendo de campo alto una gran familia y construir un mejor país.
texts.en:
Santiago, 25, dreams of having the chance to study one of the professional tracks at the Fundacion Las Mercedes. More than anything, he wants to give his family a better future, leaving behind his work as a motorbike messenger. He has strong convictions and truly wants to grow as a person in all aspects. And ultimately he wants to take advantage of the opportunity and ease that the foundation provides in conjunction with Kiva to educate himself and have a better tomorrow. They make it easy to get financing and accessible prices, and it is a little cheaper for him to make monthly payments to Kiva than the price Las Mercedes is offering. In addition, they offer a number of technical programs and are recognized at a national level.

He hopes that he can continue to count on your support to keep building the family at Campo Alto and bettering their country.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Boresha Maisha Group

texts.fr: La Cliente Muvingi est une commerçante  d’une expérience de 5 ans, âgée de 35 ans et mère de 4 enfants qui tous  étudient. La cliente est membre d’un collectif d’Affaires «Boresha Maisha». Elle est vendeuse de friperie (Draps de lits, essuie mains, etc.). Elle installe ses marchandises dans un marché central de la ville. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre son activité. Elle va acheter 5 ballons de friperie. Elle démarra ses affaires avec le fonds reçu de son mari. Son conjoint est un fonctionnaire de l'administration publique.(Percepteur des impôts). Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite accroitre son crédit, acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux hommes et femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, en leur accordant de microcrédit, pendant, ce moment post conflits dans la région de l’Est du pays.
texts.en: Our customer Muvingi is an entrepreneur with five years of business experience. She is 35 years old and the mother of four children, all of whom attend school. This client is the member of the Boresha Maisha business group. She sells used clothing (bed linens, towels etc). She sets up her merchandise at the central market of her town. She is seeking a loan from Hekima to grow her business. She will buy five bales of used clothing. She has launched her business with the starting funds received from her husband. Her husband works in public administration (as a tax collection agent). In the future, she would like to take out a larger loan, buy a land plot, and provide for the education and food of her children. She thanks Hekima for its support of male and female entrepreneurs who have no access to traditional banking through microloans,  at this time  following  armed conflicts in the eastern part of the country.

loans.use: to buy five bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a lady who is 30 years old, single, with no children. She lives with her mom and supports her with the income she makes by selling soft drink from her parents' house.

Caroline wants to increase her sales by buying more drinks to sell to customers.

loans.use: To buy more drinks to sell to customers.

loans.name: Roland

texts.en:
Roland is from Norabats village of Masis region. He lives there together with his parents and brother. Roland's father works at the local gas station and his mother is a saleswoman in clothing store. 

For sustaining his family financially, Roland has been sewing car seat covers for years. He is already skilled and qualified tailor with a good list of loyal customers. Due to his hard work, Roland is able to gather enough income for covering his family's basic needs. He has now applied for this loan to be able to purchase materials for sewing car seat covers. The loan is very important for Roland to cover current orders and gather higher income. He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. Roland hopes for lenders' support and he will be very grateful for the loan.

loans.use: to pay for materials for sewing car seat covers

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.en:
Jeannette is aged 39 years. She is a mother of three, but unfortunately her husband passed away. All her children go to school. 

Jeannette runs a boutique, and she has been in the business for eight years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and peanuts to sell. She is planning to use the profits for use in renovating the house.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, rice and peanuts for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more pepper, palm oil, salt, etc. for her food market

loans.name: Biakoye Group

texts.en:
Faustina is a 42-year-old woman residing in Accra, Ghana. She is a responsible mother of three daughters. Her husband is responsible to the entire family. She belongs to this group called Biakoye together with Joyce.

Faustina has been selling plates and clothing for three years, and contributes her income, with her husband's, to fulfill the needs of her family. She has applied for loan from Kiva's field partner ID-Ghana. She has to purchase different kinds of plates to earn maximum profit, but due to insufficient financial means she has been unable to do so. This loan will help her to purchase these items for her business and also enable her to save for her family's needs in future.

loans.use: To purchase different kinds of plates to earn maximum profit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cartons of pharmaceuticals such as paracetamol, quinine and cough syrup for her business.

loans.name: Abeduego

texts.en:
Abeduego is a married father of nine children, one of whom is below the age of fifteen. They live in a five bedroom apartment in Bamenda, Cameroon. He has faced some challenges in life such as the death of his son, father, and sister; sickness is another problem in his life. Another problem is inadequate capital to properly manage a business of his own.

With this loan, he will buy seedlings, pay for labor, buy piglets and bags of feed for his pigs. He will also invest in poultry farming- he will buy one week old and two week old chicks and buy medicine for the fowl. 

He holds a positive view of his business succeeding because he has been doing it for a long time and as such, has experience in the business. Also he has customers who buy from him regularly, and his business is situated just around town which eases the marketing of the products. The demand for chicken is high in town, due to the ever increasing populations. With this business activity, the community will benefit from good quality fowl and a reduction in prices and an increase in the food supply. The community will not have to travel long distances to buy food.

With the profit from this loan, he will increase his business, educate his children, pay all his hospital bills, provide three square meals to his family, expand his business, and support all village developments. He prefers GHAPE loans because of their low interest rates with convenient repayment intervals, and also because their members are trained before the loan is disbursed. Finally, the social needs of members is a concern to GHAPE.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and to pay for farm work, piglets, and feed for his poultry.

loans.name: Emelda

texts.en:
Emelda is married with eight children, and they all live in a four bedroom apartment in Bamenda Mezam Division of the North West region of Cameroon. She has faced some challenges in life, among which is the accident of her brother, the death of her sister, the incident that lead her husband to lose his job, and inadequate finance to properly manage her business.

She has taken and successfully repaid her loans six times and says with the new loan requested, she will buy chicks, piglets, feed, seedlings, oil, fuel and wood. She holds a positive view for her business succeeding because she has been doing it for so long and as such has experience in the business. 
Also, Emelda has customers who buy from her regularly and her business is situated at a good site were the demand for chicken and farm products is high.

With this business activity, the community will benefit in a reduction in prices and the people of Emelda's community will not have to travel long distances to buy the goods Emelda's business provides. 

With the profit from this loan, she will educate her children, pay all the bills of her children, provide three square meals to her family, expand her business and support all family developments. She preferred GHAPE loans because of the low interest rates and there are convenient repayment intervals. Also, members are trained before the loan is disburse.

loans.use: To buy chickens, feed, piglets, fuel, wood and pay for the farm.

loans.name: Christina

texts.en:
Christina is married with six children. They live in a three-bedroom apartment in Bamenda Mezam Division of the northwest region of Cameroon. She has faced some challenges in life among which is the death of her brother and sister, sickness amongst the family and also inadequate finance to properly manage her business.

With the loan requested, she will buy seedlings, pay for her farm work labor, and buy piglets and two bags of feed for her pigs.  She holds a positive outlook for her business succeeding because she has been doing it for so long and as such has experience in the business. Also she has customers who buy from her regularly and her business is situated in a good location were the demand for farm products is high. With this business activity the community will benefit from a reduction in prices; the people of the community will not have to travel longer distances to buy food.

With the profits from this loan she will educate her children, pay all her hospital bills from her children, provide three square meals for her family, expand her business and support all family developments. She prefers a GHAPE loan because of the low interest rates and there are convenient repayment intervals.  Also members are trained before the loan is disbursed and social needs of members are taken care of.

loans.use: To buy seeds, pay farm work, buy piglets and feed.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    DANAYA est constitué de  6 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 38 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  DOUGOUNINA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 3ème prêt. Les 2 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  produits cosmétiques à l’image de BA DIALLO qui est la 1ère femme debout  dans la photo de la droite  vers  la  gauche. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, diverses qualités de produits cosmétiques  avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Danaya Group consists of six married women who have an average age of 38 years and an average of five children each. They live in traditional extended families in the Dougounina district of the city of Bougouni. They know one another through ties of vicinity, friendship and commerce. To increase their financial capacity and improve their commerce, the group joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are currently on their third loan cycle. Their two prior loans loans have been repaid in full.

This group of women sells cosmetics. Ba Diallo is shown in the photo standing on the far right. With her loan, she intends to purchase various grades of cosmetics from wholesalers in Bougouni. Ba Diallo retails her merchandise at the market and from her home, for cash and on credit to a mixed clientele. She hopes to earn an average monthly income of 50,000 Francs CFA which she will use to reinvest in her business and repay her loan.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Faragnogonkan Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    FARAGNOGONKAN est constitué de  4 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  DIALANIKORO de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 3ème prêt. Les 2 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  jus à l’image de KADIATOU qui est la 1ère femme  debout dans la photo de la gauche vers la droite. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 3 sacs de sucre et une quantité suffisante de gingembre  avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Faragnogonkan Group consists of four married women who have an average age of 39 years and an average of three children each. They live in traditional extended families in the Dialanikoro district of the city of Bougouni. They know one another through ties of vicinity, friendship and commerce. To increase their financial capacity and improve their commerce, the group joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are currently on their third loan cycle. Their two prior loans loans have been repaid in full.

This group of women sells juice. Kadiatou is shown in the photo standing on the far left. With her loan, she intends to purchase three sacks of sugar and a sufficient quantity of ginger from the wholesalers in Bougouni. Kadiatou retails her merchandise at the market and from her home, for cash and on credit to a mixed clientele. She hopes to earn an average monthly income of 20,000 Francs CFA which will be used to reinvest in the business and repay her loan.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for juice-making.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cassava and coal for her business.

loans.name: Lavdush

texts.en:
Lavdush has been photographed here with his son, the second child. He works in construction and his wife in a restaurant. Lavdush, who lives in a city in southeastern Albania, wants to buy a stove and a boiler with this loan. 

The city where they live has a very cold and snowy climate yet with clean and fresh air to breath, it is considered helpful to individuals who suffer from breathing problems; the city is also situated on a mountainous landscape. Residents of the city are known for making the best pies called “lakror” still baked primitively in a rounded dish put on top of embers and covered with a lid called a “saç.” Whether the pies are made with fresh spinach, cottage cheese and eggs, with tomatoes and onions or wild greens such as nettles, they are just delicious. In addition, they are known for the baked apples as they are produced in abundance in the region.

loans.use: to buy a boiler and a stove where they can cook the best known pie in Albania; the "lakror"

loans.name: Kankele Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    KANKELE est constitué de  4 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 46 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  DOUGOUNINA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 6ème prêt. Les 5 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  céréales à l’image de YAMA qui est la femme assise dans la photo. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 300 kg de maïs et 300 kg de mil avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 35.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Kankele Group consists of four married women who have an average age of 46 years and an average of five children each. They live in traditional extended families in the Dougounina district of the city of Bougouni. They know one another through ties of vicinity, friendship and commerce. To increase their financial capacity and improve their commerce, the group joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are currently on their sixth loan cycle. Their five prior loans loans have been repaid in full.

This group of women sells grain. Yama is shown in the photo seated in the front. With her loan, she intends to purchase 300 kg of maize and 300 kg of millet from the wholesalers in Bougouni. Yama retails her merchandise at the market and from her home, for cash and on credit to a mixed clientele. She hopes to earn an average monthly income of 35,000 Francs CFA which will be used to reinvest in her business and repay her loan.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale grain for resale.

loans.name: Gloria Yuri

texts.es:
Ella es  gloria yuri , ella es una mujer emprendedora, solidaria con voluntad y ganas de superación , para prestar los servicios para bien de los enfermos, adultos mayores, y en general en el lugar en que se encuentre.  Ella quiere prepararse en enfermería, precisamente para cumplir lo mencionado anteriormente.
Ella tuvo la fortuna de encontrarse con una sede de  campo alto cerca de la casa y con una ex-alumna de esta entidad que certifica la buena enseñanza de Campo-alto.  Ella ha visto como muchas egresadas han mejorado la condición socio económica y personal, sin tener en cuenta las edades y niveles económicos, ella ve que los egresados son mejores personas.
Yuri piensa que es muy importante contar con una certificación  de una entidad acreditada, ya que ella cuenta con una experiencia de mas de diez años en la labor de asistir adultos mayores.  ella piensa presta los servicios a nivel social, familiar y personal
Ya que para ella es muy importante la salud física, mental y psicología pues para ella es el mejor tesoro que una persona puede tener. 
Ella es una mujer muy independiente, factor que le ayuda mucho para cumplir la labor por turnos.
Ella seria muy  beneficiada si sale favorecida con el auxilio de kiva,  ella es  una persona seria  y responsable en las labores y en todos los estudios.
texts.en:
This is Gloria Yuri.  She is an enterprising lady with the will and desire to succeed, so that she can provide services to the sick, aging, and people in general.  She wants to prepare herself as a nurse so she can do the aforementioned.
 
She was fortunate to meet a host near her home.  She was a former student of this field who praised the good teaching of Campo-alto.  She has seen many graduates who have improved their socio economic and personal status, regardless of age and economic levels, she sees that graduates are better people.

Yuri believes that it’s very important to have a certification from an accredited institution and she already has 10 years’ experience working with elderly adults.  She wants to provide social, family, and personal service.  For her, physical, mental, and psychological help is important and she is the best treasure that any person can have.

She is a very independent women, which helps her complete her work in stages.  She will he helped very much is she gets help from Kiva.  She is a serious and responsible person in her work and studies.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La Señora. María forma parte del grupo de crédito El Crédito, este es su tercer crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas quienes le han brindado apoyo y alegrías ya que en cada reunión salen de sus rutinas diarias y comparten gratos momentos. Vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que está rodeada de montañas por su geografía accidentada, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza. Su gente aun mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
La Señora María tiene 22 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija de 5 años que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, su esposo labora en una unidad de taxi que es de su propiedad, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros.
Doña María todos los días labora como secretaria de una estación de radio taxi, en sus tiempos libres se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y de ropa, por las noches se encuentra estudiando en el colegio. El dinero de su crédito es para compra ropa y cosméticos y también para renovar su licencia de conducir. Su meta es graduarse y llegar a tener un mejor trabajo.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the El Credito lending group and this is her third cycle along with her friends who have provided support and happiness because they are away from their usual routines in every meeting and share happy moments.  She lives in Cuenca, a city surrounded by mountains because of its accidental geography.  It has been a World Heritage Site since December of 1999 and there are various places from which to enjoy nature.  It’s people maintain their culture and traditions.

Maria is 22 years old, married, and has a five year old daughter who attends the local school.  Her husband works as a taxi driver and has his own taxi.  They live with her in-laws.

Maria works as a secretary for a radio dispatched taxi service and sells cosmetics and clothing in her spare time.  She also attends night school.  She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing and cosmetics and also to renew her driver’s license.  Her goal is to graduate and get a better job.

loans.use: to buy clothing and renew her driver's license.

loans.name: Irene Alexandra

texts.es:
La Señora Irene es una socia del grupo de crédito El Crédito, se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas y compañeras, comparte gratos momentos en cada reunión ya que sale de su rutina diaria, al mismo tiempo que los créditos le ayudan en el crecimiento de su negocio. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que está rodeada de montañas por su geografía accidentada, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza. Su gente aun mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
La Señora Irene tiene 46 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos mayores de edad que son casados y viven independientes, su esposo es chofer profesional y labora conduciendo un taxi de su propiedad, la casa en la que viven es de propia.
Doña Irene desde hace 20 años se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida típica (hornado, cascarita, cuyes), trabaja en su negocio de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. El dinero de su crédito va a  invertir en la compra de víveres para la preparación de sus alimentos al igual que una nueva vajilla y mesas. Su meta es agrandar mucho más su negocio.
texts.en:
Irene is a member of the El Credito lending group and is in her fourth cycle with her friends.  They share happy moments in every meeting and she takes a break from her daily routine.  At the same time, the loans help her to grow her business.  She lives in Cuenca, a city surrounded by mountains because of its accidental geography.  It has been a World Heritage Site since December of 1999 and there are various places from which to enjoy nature.  It’s people maintain their culture and traditions. 

Irene is 46 years old, married and has three adult children who are now married and on their own.  Her husband is a professional driver and drives his own taxi.  They own their home.

Irene has been making and selling typical food (hornado, peel, cascarita, Guinea pig) for 20 years and works her business seven days a week without a fixed schedule.  She will use the money from this loan to buy ingredients to prepare her dishes.  She will also buy new tables and place settings.  Her goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and tables.

loans.name: Aquiles Santiago

texts.es:
Aquiles  Santiago tiene 44 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC 30 de julio, se encuentra ubicada en recinto Zapotal Nuevo, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas.

Aquiles Santiago  se dedica  a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz y maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes urea, abonos, líquido mata monte.

Las compras y las ventas de los productos las realizará en la ciudad de ventanas mensualmente. 

El sueño es tener un negocio productivo. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte y pasar con la familia.
texts.en:
Aquiles Santiago is 44 years old, single, and has a son. He lives in the city of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

He is a member of the July 30th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Zapotal Nuevo in the canton of Ventanas. The members are farm workers.

Aquiles Santiago is a farmer who grows rice and corn. He is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies such as fertilizers, urea, compost, and liquid weed killer. His purchases and sales are conducted in the city of Ventanas on a monthly basis. His dream is to have a productive business.

In his free time, Aquiles Santiago enjoys playing sports and spending time with his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: María Lucila

texts.es:
La Señora María forma parte del grupo de crédito Pauteñitas, vive en el cantón de Paute, lugar que goza de un clima templado y de tierras fértiles donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores y una gran variedad de frutas, su gente es amable y trabajadora, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
La Señora. María tiene 42 años de edad, es divorciada, en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6  hijos, uno de sus hijos es casado y vive independiente, dos de sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan  económicamente, sus tres últimos hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad, la casa en la que vive es propia.
Doña María se dedica a la cría de cuyes, gallinas de postura, cerdos y pollos,  también a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su casa y para la venta. El dinero de su crédito es para la compra de cuyes, gallinas, pollos y alimento para animales. Su meta es  crecer en la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
Sra. María is a member of the Communal Bank “Pauteñitas”. She lives in the canton of Paute, a place that experiences a mild climate and has fertile land for growing the most beautiful flowers and a wide variety of fruits. The people are friendly and hardworking. They have also been able to maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Sra. María is 42 years old, divorced, and has six children. One child is married and lives independently. Two other children work and help her financially. The youngest three children attend a school in the city. She owns the house in which she lives.

Doña María raises guinea pigs, egg-laying hens, pigs, and chickens. She is also a farmer who cultivates crops for household consumption and for sale. The money from this loan will be used to buy guinea pigs, hens, chickens, and feed for the animals. Her goal is to grow her animal business.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, hens, chickens, and animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coal to increase her sales.

loans.name: Shakhadat

texts.ru: Шахадат 45 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Дочь замужем, двое старших сыновей работают в России в ресторане - грузчиками, часть своей зарплаты высылают родителям в Кыргызстан, самый младший сын-школьник. Супруг Абылкасым-фермер с большим опытом. У Шахадат - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Шахадат занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS.
